snippet.title: Infinite Space - Nintendo DS trailer
snippet.description: Infinite Space, an RPG exclusively for the Nintendo DS, is set in outer space and allows players the chance to control, build, outfit and customise more than 150 spaceships. Developed by Platinum Games, the game follows the story of Yuri, a young crewman who journeys the galaxy and slowly rises up the ranks to become captain of his very own spaceship. Players will battle their way through space, exploring planets and the solar system, as they try to become the strongest fleet in the galaxy.
